name: Jet (itch)
description:
Our entry for the Global Game Jam 2017. Use the sound of your voice to move around obstacles, the louder your voice, the higher up the screen you get.

Made with UE4.

Credits:

Sebastien Hutt - Programmer, Level Designer

Kristen Malone - Concept Artist, 3D Artist

Cory Hamelehle - Technician, Moral Support, Provider of Cookies
